name: asm_migration_directory
scriptContent:
import sys
import os
import json
import commands
import asm_file_path
reload(asm_file_path)

sys.path.insert(0,AVX::HELPER)
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::DEPENDENCIES)

avx_path = asm_file_path.return_path()+'/../../'
directory_path = avx_path+'ASM_Backup/'

def return_directory_path():
	if not os.path.exists(directory_path):
		os.mkdir(directory_path)
	return directory_path
